body: Hi Dr. Farnsworth, I had a question about the crown listed on my plan. Can we discuss alternatives?
Hi Jane, absolutely. I've asked our treatment coordinator to give you a call this afternoon to discuss the options.
Hi, I see my invoice INV-2025-1001 shows an amount due, but I thought my insurance covered cleanings at 100%. Can you please check this?

Hi Jane, we've reviewed your invoice and can confirm your insurance benefits. It looks like your plan covers cleanings at 80% after your deductible, which resulted in the small co-payment. Please let us know if you have more questions!
You're all set! We've moved your appointment for the crown placement to Nov 28th at 2:00 PM as requested. See you then!
Thanks Brenda, that makes sense. I'll pay that amount now.
